unnormalised: Mhaka konnen tor vicharlem: "Indigo-ntlean vimanant vochpachen mhanllear ekdom bore bhaxechen auto-rickshaw-ntlean vochpa sarkhem asa?" Satyam sangta zalear, ek Bharatiya mhonnun, mhaka hacho jab diunk layki asa mhonn mhaka dista. Tori astana, tayar ravat, bhayo ani bhainno, kiteak hanga krur satya asa.
normalised: Konnen mhaka vicharle: "Indigo-n vochon mhonnje khub shandar auto-rickshaw-n vochon?" Imanen, ek Bharatiya mhunn hanv he babtint utor divonk khub pavto. Dekhun, kemar kasun dhora, bhaiyo aur behno, kiteak itihasantli khari vostu hanga asa.

unnormalised: Poilem, boski. Indigo paayank mellche zageachem ghoshan karta, sarke? Punn, mhoje nanaji-che bail gaddiek ani-i chodd zago aslo, sarkhem nhoi, punn tumkam mhojem sangop somzot. Tumchea mukhel boskecher tumcho sparsh zoonk na mhonn tanchench. Tumkam vhanuk haddche koleanchea sarke dista, punn hey, tumi konnak tor vantyak paucho asa, sarke? Ani khaddkhaddit gramin rastea bodlek, tumi 30,000 ft vegin udaan karta. Thoddi daya.
normalised: Poilem mhonnje, boskechi zaga. Indigo zagechi chint'ta divan, soringacho davo sangta, barobar? Mhaka dista mhoje nanajichea bailanchi gaddi-n khub chint'ta divan soringachi zaga asli, okem tor naka, punn tumi mhaka samzon ghenv. Purti zaga tumchea fudlech boskecho sparsh korunaka, zor tumkam modot zata tor. Tumchen ek transportacho ekthan kelolea kombdem bhaxen dista, punn hey, konnen tor tumkam kiteai mellta, barobar? Ani addan rural rastea voir, tumi tis hojar fuddan voir soring korun assa. Lhan daya.

unnormalised: Jevonn, oh, jevonn! Tumkam tem fannkel sandwich mahit asa zo tumkam tumchea fridge-chea fatlean ek satolleant mellta? Indigo-chem jevonn... thodem barem. Tem ek rasoi-ichem sahas mhonn chintaat, zantunt sahas mhanllear tumi tem kiteak kaitaat tem olkhunk yot. Veggie puff? Chicken wrap? Bread-ant gupt padarth? Konn zanna? Guptak apnnayt! Snacks aanat, zaitench. Mhanllear, ek lhan gramak posunk puro. Mhajecher visvas thevat. Hanv sodanch lays-chea don packets ani udkachi ek bottle aannta.
normalised: Khaun, oh khaun! Tumkam mahit asa tench khallkallem sandwich tumkam tumchea fridgeache fattim ek satollea uprant mellta? Indigo-che khaun... thode bore asa. Tankam ek pachok jivanacho prayog mhunn chintun ghea, zo prayog tumkam khata tench tumi nirnay korpak prayatn kortale. Veggie puff? Chicken wrap? Breadant gupt vastu? Konnak mahit! Guptacho angikar kara! Snacks dhara, khub dhara. Tankam, ek lhan ganvant posunk puro. Mhojer visar dhora ek. Hanv sodanch don packets lays ani udkachea bottle sangata dharta.

unnormalised: Velar pavop, te davyan sangta te tanchem USP asa, punn vimanam vellicher pavop poros "Bharatiya Niyamit Vel" asat. IST mhonnun aami tem mogan apoita, ek siddhantak vel zontrant vell mhanllear ek suchna matren asa. Pilot aple bhitli Rajinikanth-chi urja vaprun poileanuch utrun yeta, vo tumi Delhi-chea voir dodat 2 hrs bhonvton ravoncho "tantrik trasacho" lagun. Konn zanna? Tech bhag mhan! Tem ek achryak dhoiro mhonn chintaat, punn hanv sodanch dhireant ek sampurnn web series sampta.
normalised: Velancher yeuchea babtint, te uloita te tanchi U-S-P mhunn, punn flights "Indian Standard Time"-n chalu zata, velencher nôi. I-S-T mhunn ami mogan uloita, ek tathrik veltacho zone, thoim vel fakt ek suchavon asa. Pilot aplo Rajinikanth-cho gunn vaprunk puro ani poilim utorunk puro, vôi tumkam dodat don hor Delhi voir ghuvdak lagun "tekniki addchan" asa mhunn. Konnak mahit? Tench ek bhag mhunn dista! Tankam ek uktem delay mhunn chintun ghea, punn hanv obhiprayachem ek web series sampaytam delays vellar.

unnormalised: Ani ghoshnna visrunk naka. Crew sodanch khuxal astat. Mhanllear, unnervously khuxal. Dhakdiki tumcho chai tumchea cup-antlean bhair sorun yeta mhonn dhomkavta astana, tem hanson tumkam "tumchea vimanacho anand ghetat" mhonn sangta. Mhaka dista tankam khuxalponna-cher adarit telan urja mellta, tem, satyam sangta zalear, mhaka bottle-nt bhortoleponn vikcheak zai.
normalised: Ani ami vishvash korunk zonvonk naka announcements. Crew sodanch hushar asta. Tankam ek aashcharyachya bhaxen hushar mhunn dista. Zori garbad vellar tumchi chai tambeantli bhaier yetele bhaxen dista, te ugddasa dita ani uloita tumkam "tumchi flight ugddasa kara" mhunn. Mhaka dista te kitlech optimism-adharit fuel-n chalu asta, jen mhojek bottle-n bharun vikan lagta.

unnormalised: Punn hanga gosht asa, kitlench vichitr asta astana, Indigo tumkam point A-ntlean point B-nt paucho karta, sodanch ek kimtin zantunt tumkam tumchem kidney vikchem poddonam. Tem aplem adhvaitik dhongant visvaspaatra asa. Tem tea mitrachim sarke asa zo sodanch deriek yeta, punn sodanch shevottak yetach. Tori tem ek bhare auto-rickshaw asa? Bharem nhoi zalear tori, akashant auto-rickshaw asa. Tori ek pavtt Delhi-ntlean Mumbai-k ₹3000-k vochonk tumkam zai, ticket book karat ani adhvaitikponnak apnnayt. Tum sorak paucho asa.
normalised: Punn hanga ek vostu asa, zori tachea sadhea gunnank asa, Indigo tumkam point A than point B-n porta, chodd korun mol ek kidney vikunk poddonaka. Tankam ek aspasht ritin visvasik mhunn dista. Tankam to ixtt mhunn dista sodanch ukrand asa, punn sodanch vakhro zalear yetalo. Tankam ek shandar auto-rickshaw mhunn dista? Kiteak tankam shandar naka, punn tankam auto-rickshaw mhunn dista akashant. Uprant tumkam Delhi than Mumbai-n tin hozar rupee-n vochonk poddta zalear, ticket book kara ani aspashtichi bhagivanti kara. Tumchea vakhro zalear tumkam mellto.

unnormalised: Tankam snacks bhortoleponn yaad thevat, tumchea umedichem vordaan divat, ani kiteak tori, tumi khorench safariacho anand ghetolo. Khuxi-che udbek pavat! Ani ballam yaad thevat, dhakdhiki mhanllear ek fonkat roller coaster-chi safar asa. Aamchea unnervously khuxal karmchareamni suchoil'le soglle surakxe niyamo paalan karat. Jai Hind!
normalised: Fakt yad dovra te snacks dhara, tumchi apeksha ghoddovun ghea, ani puro tumkam anand mellto. Khuxi zalolea flight! Ani yad dovra bhurgeank, garbad fakt ek mukt roller coaster ride. Yaad dovra tumkam porinnamanchi suraksha nem divche unnervously hushar staff-n sangilela. Jai Hind!
